synopsis.text: Kawatarou is a young kappa living in a tranquil village populated by his kind. However, their peace is shattered when a tumultuous storm strikes, devastating their home and drying up the river that sustained them with fish. With the village weakened and facing starvation, Kawatarou embarks on a critical mission into the mountains alongside his girlfriend. There, the pair hopes to discover a bounty that can restore vitality to their people. This story of calamity and perseverance originated as a popular children's comic by acclaimed manga artist Kon Shimizu. Now brought vividly to life through animation, it promises to entrance viewers young and old with its mythical characters while delivering a timely message about overcoming adversity.
